description: Incip.: ... کتاب الاىمان وفىه ثلثة ابواب الباب الاول فى نفس الىمىن وهو عبارةَ عن تحقىق ما ىحتمل المخالفة بذکر الله vol. 15 (kitāb al-aymān- kitāb adab al-qaḍā. incompl. at end.). ff. 157. 255 x 177; 200 x 125 mm. 23 lin. 14th cen. Commentary on al-Ghazzālīʼs work: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 543 (no. 50. commentary b); S I, 753: concerning the title (Fatḥ al-ʻazīz or al-Azīz) cf. ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, Sūrah v. al-Wajīz. col. 2003.
author: Rāfiʻī, ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Muḥammad, 1162-1226
creator: Rāfiʻī, ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Muḥammad, 1162-1226
subject: Ghazzālī, 1058-1111—Wajīz fī fiqh madhhab al-Imām al-Shāfiʻī.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
